'''Heavy Fir Forging Table''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Interacting with the Heavy Fir Forging Table opens the [[forging]] menu and allows the player to use it as a regular blacksmith's forge.

The blueprint for Heavy Fir Forging Table is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|time = 14h
